original_text: And as soon as Aaron spoke to the whole congregation of the people of Israel, they looked toward the wilderness, and behold, the glory of the Lord appeared in the cloud.
korean_text: 아론이 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중에게 말하매 그들이 광야를 바라보니 여호와의 영광이 구름 속에 나타나더라

sentences.original_text: And as soon as Aaron spoke to the whole congregation of the people of Israel,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아론이 이스라엘 백성의 온 회중에게 말하자마자,

sentences.original_text: the glory of the Lord appeared in the cloud.
